title: Solana Saga phones trigger cryptocurrency frenzy with soaring resale prices
description: Initially met with tepid sales, Saga phones now command extraordinary prices on platforms such as eBay. Completed listings reveal staggering figures, with some units fetching over $2,000. Astonishingly, reports emerged of two phones selling for a jaw-dropping $5,000, emphasizing the fervor surrounding this unexpected trend. Unveiling the Saga phenomenon The surge in demand for Saga […]
